page.title: 16Edlington's Youth Activities
page.content: We surveyed 266 children about the youth organisations they belong to. 58 pupils attend the Youth Club;28 the Marching Bands.Guides,Brownies,Scouts, Cubs,Girls and Boys Brigades,Army Cadets,boxing and local football clubs had 1-7 pupils attending each one.Of unorganised activities most children play out and go swimming.Next comes football,bicycling and watching T.V. Edlington Youth Club is for 10-13yr olds.To join costs 35p,after that 10p per visit.Downstairs there are foods,drinks,table and arcade games, sewing and dance groups.Upstairs; toilets and a disco.Guides,for 10-14yr old girls,is held at the Community Centre on Thursdays,18.30-20.30.You need a blue uniform and 25p weekly subs.St Johns is held at the Pit Yard Drill Hall,adults free,children 2p a week for 2 hour lessons;uniforms free.
